strapiEvent.name: Fayetteville Lights The Square This Friday
strapiEvent.description:
Fayetteville will flip on the switch for the Lights of the Ozarks this Friday at 6p, sparking holiday magic across the Square and inspiring wannabe Clark Griswold’s across the city. 

  • Flip the switch: Lighting Night will also include a parade, a community carol led by the Symphony of Northwest Arkansas, free photos with Santa, and a huge selection of food trucks.
  • All season long: Enjoy holiday music, winter treats, hot cocoa, and plenty of vendors on the Downtown Square each night during Lights of the Ozarks until Jan 1. 

Vote Lights of the Ozarks as USA Today’s Best Public Holiday Lights Display HERE.
